description: This file defines a Flutter UI screen named HomeScreen, which is a stateful widget featuring role-based content. It manages user roles such as admin, manager, and delivery agent, displaying different UI components and options depending on the selected role. The code includes custom widgets, theme usage, and interaction handlers.

classes.name: HomeScreen
classes.description: A Flutter StatefulWidget representing the main home screen with role selection and role-specific content.

classes.name: AppRole
classes.description: An enumeration defining user roles: admin, manager, delivery.

classes.name: _HomeScreenState
classes.description: The state class managing the internal logic and UI of HomeScreen, including role selection and content rendering.

classes.name: _ListTile
classes.description: A simple widget displaying a label with an icon, used for listing features within role views.

methods.name: _buildRoleSelector
methods.description: Builds a dropdown menu for selecting user roles.

methods.name: _buildRolePills
methods.description: Creates clickable role indicator pills for quick role switching.

methods.name: _titleForRole
methods.description: Provides the title string based on the current role.

methods.name: _buildRoleContent
methods.description: Renders role-specific UI content based on the selected role.
